title: Calories in Modelo Beer
meta_description: Discover calories in modelo beer per bottle, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations like light versions.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz bottle of Modelo Especial lager; values based on typical serving without mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by specific variant, serving size, and brand batch; alcohol content affects calorie density. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz bottle of Modelo Especial contains 145 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a salted rim and lime

faqs.q: How many calories in a Modelo Especial?
What are the carbs in modelo beer?
faqs.a: Approximately 13.5 g carbs per bottle, with no fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Is Modelo beer low in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, only 1.1 g protein per bottle.

faqs.q: Calories in Modelo Light vs regular?
faqs.a: Modelo Light has 90 calories, 55 fewer than regular Modelo Especial.

faqs.q: Does Modelo have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Zero fat and zero cholesterol per serving.
